definition: chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]

sentences.english: A target function for design of hydraulic hand drills is brought forward in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了设计手持式液压凿岩机的目标函数。

sentences.english: Therefore this system is a effective means for developing a hydraulic rock drill.
sentences.chinese: 因此该系统是研制液压凿岩机的重要辅助手段。

sentences.english: The importance and application of a new type pneumatic drill in drilling are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了风钻在凿岩和钻探技术中的重要性和应用。

sentences.english: This article studies the auto_position system of rock drilling arm.
sentences.chinese: 就凿岩钻臂的自动定位系统进行了研究。

sentences.english: Niche refers to dig for the original rock cliff, to set the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 龛原指掘凿岩崖为空，以安置佛像之所。

sentences.english: This paper presents the mult- goal optimal design of the valveless pneumatic rock-drilling.
sentences.chinese: 本文对无阀型气动凿岩机进行多目标优化。

sentences.english: It is suitable for impact-resistant rock-working mining tools&wearparts.
sentences.chinese: 适于制作抗冲击的矿山凿岩钻具和耐磨零件。

sentences.english: The stability of drilling chamber is an important facet to ensure the safe operation of VCR mining method.
sentences.chinese: 凿岩峒室的稳定性是VCR采矿法安全的重要保障。

sentences.english: Pneumatic crawler drill rig is a kind of rock drilling equipment in construction.
sentences.chinese: 气动履带式钻车是一种工程用凿岩钻孔设备。

definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
